description: A React functional component implementing a rich text editor with formatting tools, allowing users to input and style text with options like bold, italics, headings, lists, quotes, and code blocks.

methods.name: exec
methods.description: Executes formatting commands in the contentEditable div, such as bold or italic, and triggers the onChange callback with updated innerHTML.

methods.name: handleInput
methods.description: Handles input events by invoking the onChange callback with the current innerHTML of the editable div.
